name: Kane Lariviere
statement: My work is focused on building engaging & memorable experiences for the web while advocating for accessibility, affordability, & equity.
about: As a developer, I've had to wear many hats. I deliver high-quality, production-ready code for a diverse array of projects for clients, tailored to their needs and the needs of the commununities they serve. My work mostly consists of code, but I've had the pleasure of working in various areas of digital design, including but not limited to front-end development, UI/UX design, & graphic design. It's my goal in my work to commit myself to accessibility, equity, education, & sustainability and I do my best to contribute to those ideals whenever and however I can. Outside of work, I try to hone my creativity through multiple outlets. I write & play music, I'm an avid D&D nerd and gamer, I love to explore the world with my fianc√©e & play with my dog, Sundance, and my cat, Tadashi.

project-1.title: TTRPCompanion
project-1.description: TTRPCompanion is a gaming utility app that allows users to track their character's stats in D&D or other TTRPG Campaigns.

project-2.title: The View From Inside
project-2.description: The View From Inside is an exceptionally performant blog powered by Sanity's dynamic capabilities.

project-3.title: KeepUp
project-3.description: KeepUp is a full stack social media app. KeepUp allows users to post 'notes' ranging from 1 to 240 characters.

project-4.title: The Sky Is Fake
project-4.description: The Sky Is Fake is a full stack social media/image sharing app.

project-5.title: Abstract
project-5.description: Abstract is an innovative ecommerce store that offers a unique focus on concepts related to consumerism and materialism.
